description:
Yuuhi struggles to cope with Hangetsu`s death and actually fight as new Beast Knights appear before him and Samidare, and band together to face the next golems.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Karasu no Kishi to Shinonome Mikazuki
Le chevalier corbeau et Mikazuki Shinonome
The Crow Knight and Shinonome Mikazuki
カラスの騎士と東雲三日月
